de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.metrical.mtreevariants.strategies.split

Class Assignments<E extends MTreeEntry>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.metrical.mtreevariants.strategies.split.Assignments<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of MetricalEntry used in the M-Tree

    public class Assignments<E extends MTreeEntry>
extends Object
    Encapsulates the attributes of an assignment during a split.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Elke Achtert
